author: Jerrin
content: Bullish: Will wake up when it will hit 200. Doesn’t matter what will happen in between. Go up go down go sideways who cares. Long term bulls have nothing to worry

author: Michael
content: The future growth in big tech has already been priced in including rate cuts. This part of the market is overvalued and out of gas. A sizable correction on the Nasdaq is setting up. Good luck!

author: Optimus
content: Bullish: Bashers with PTSD.. Market moves can be frustrating, but focusing on the bigger picture is key. NVDA’s fundamentals remain strong, and these short-term drops often set the stage for massive rebounds. Patience pays off in the end.

author: Zach
content: Bearish: one day you'll be able to tell your grandchildren the story about where you were the day the AI bubble popped

author: Optimus
content: Bullish: Bashers: Apparently, you’re as lost as you appear to be. Might want to sit this one out and learn something first. NVDA closed green today! Good night 🌙

author: tom
content: Couldn't hold 137 looked weak  after a selloff from earnings, most likely going lower from here

author: christopher
content: Bullish: Another successful day trading Nvidia. Keep it long. The true investors. Shorts are for dummies

author: Kovi
content: Bearish: This stock is a dud

author: Optimus
content: Bullish: Jensen Huang has built NVIDIA into an AI and tech giant with 94% year over year revenue growth and a 55% profit margin… but bashers think they know better? While they sit here whining, the man recognized by Time as one of the most influential people is busy shaping the future. Keep bashing; he’ll keep winning, along with those who invest in him!

author: Mike
content: Thanks for a garbage holiday season Huang
